doc.title: 'Shamrock' and 'Columbia'
doc.plot: "A magnificent view of the two racing yachts rounding the mark in the race of Oct. 7, 1899. The boats are running neck and neck, and it is a luffing match to see which rounds the mark first. The 'Columbia' holds the inside position, and wins."
